organization.name: University of Wisconsin–Madison Data Science Institute

messages.sign_up_with: If you are a UW affiliate, please sign up with your UW NetID.  Otherwise, sign up with a username of your choice.
messages.sign_in_with: If you created your map account with your UW NetID, please select that option.  Otherwise, sign in with the username that you chose when creating your map account.

interests.label: Select the data science items of interest to you:

appointments.label: Select the appointment types of interest to you:

affiliates.label: Show members of the Data Science Institute Affiliates program.

sidebar.message: Would you like collaborate on your data science project? Connect with us through our Data Science Services program.

welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.message: Welcome to the Data Science Map. We encourage you to set up your profile to make it easier for others to find you.  To edit your profile, just click the 'Edit My Profile' button at the top left. We hope you enjoy using the Data Science Map.
